DOC.detailed_description: We propose perform placebo-controlled study Alpha Lipoic Acid ( LA ) administration cohort non-obese , non-diabetic , insulin resistant subject . The insulin sensitivity 180 subject initially estimate measure fast glucose insulin level ( homeostasis model assessment ) oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) . The 60 insulin resistant subject randomize 6 week therapy either 600 mg three time day LA placebo . To quantitate ALA-induced improvement , euglycemic hyperinsulinemic clamp evaluate insulin sensitivity , OGTT use deuterated glucose evaluate glycolytic glucose disposal , muscle biopsy evaluate insulin signaling pathway , perform treatment . We believe study ( 1 ) confirm beneficial effect CR-ALA insulin sensitivity ; ( 2 ) understand molecular mechanism LA action ; ( 3 ) insulin resistant subject risk development type 2 diabetes , Metabolic Syndrome , coronary artery disease ( CAD ) , demonstration beneficial effect LA insulin action could ultimately important public health consequence .
